TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Henry Austin, 05-08-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Henry Austin, Saltillo, May 8, 1832. Has cordial letters from Mexican statesmen. Thinks bar to immigration from the United States may be repealed.
barker_notes.barker_footnotes: Copy by Moses Austin Bryan, in file of Aug. 27, 1829. See above, Feb. 18, 1832.

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Henry Austin, Saltillo, May 8, 1832. Has cordial letters from Mexican statesmen. Thinks bar to immigration from the United States may be repealed.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="05-08-1832">May 8th 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir—I sent your letter to *person_mentioned*Smith and Stillman*/person_mentioned* from *location_mentioned*Canada*/location_mentioned*, and by this last mail reed, their answer, and an order on the *person_mentioned*agent*/person_mentioned* of the late firm of*person_mentioned* R. P. Staples and Co*/person_mentioned*. for the acknowledged balance of $756.05. The *person_mentioned*agent */person_mentioned*left here for *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*before I reed, their orders. I applied to some others who are employed in arranging the accounts of the concern, and they all tell me that nothing can be had, and recommended that the account be sent to some one in *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*to represent it at the concurso of the *person_mentioned*creditors*/person_mentioned*. I fear this money will be lost—so far as I understand, the affairs of the *location_mentioned*house*/location_mentioned* are much more embarrased than was supposed. *person_mentioned*Mr Sharpe one of the agents of the concern */person_mentioned*here, for posting up the books (a *person_mentioned*Philadelphian*/person_mentioned*) thinks that not over 20 pr. cent, will be divided- he says that your debt was lost by neglect for if it had been called for *date_mentioned n="12-xx-1831">six months ago*/date_mentioned* it would have been paid, as the *person_mentioned*creditors */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*had then agreed to suffer the house to go on—since then they have become alarmed, and every one is pressing—the result is a total stopage. I have written to *person_mentioned*Smith and Stillman*/person_mentioned* on the subject and recommend them to send the account to *person_mentioned*Parrot*/person_mentioned*, to do the best he can with it. I leave *date_mentioned n="05-09-1832">to-morrow*/date_mentioned* for *location_mentioned*victoria */location_mentioned*and shall not return to *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*before *date_mentioned n="10-xx-1832">October*/date_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Mason */person_mentioned*goes with me to see the *person_mentioned*General */person_mentioned*on business, and he has a fair prospect of effecting something tho to what extent is rather doubtful. The political state of things is still unsettled and it is doubtful what will be the result, and whether the *person_mentioned*ministers */person_mentioned*will be able to sustain themselves or not. It matters not much for *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, provided peace and harmony can be preserved there which is all important now. I have very friendly letters from *person_mentioned*Don Lucas Alaman,*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Genl. Teran */person_mentioned*and the *person_mentioned*Vice President*/person_mentioned*. The memorial of the *person_mentioned*Ayuntamiento of *location_mentioned*Austin */location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*has been passed to *person_mentioned*congress */person_mentioned*with the recommendation of the *person_mentioned*President*/person_mentioned*, and the prospect is good of a repeal of the 11 article of the law of *date_mentioned n="04-06-1830">6 April 1830*/date_mentioned* also of a modification of the duties. Remember me to *person_mentioned*Mrs A. */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*children*/person_mentioned*. Yours truly */p* *p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*You ought to loose no time in locating your other *location_mentioned*sitio*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*/div1*
